title: In Venezuela Protests, Report Condemns Police's 'Pattern Of Abuse'
teaser: A Human Rights Watch report documents brutal force used by Venezuelan security forces against peaceful demonstrators â€” including beatings, shootings and, in some cases, torture. The report also shows how security forces work in cahoots with pro-government armed gangs, calling the abuses the worst they have seen in years.
